interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Star Wars: Trilogy - Episodes IV-VI
Review Date: 2016/01/24
Store: Mark Hamill  (Actor),     Carrie Fisher  (Actor)    Rated:    PG    Format: Blu-ray
Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, Blu-ray, Action & Adventure
Product Description: ["Star Wars: The Original Trilogy on Blu-ray+DVD Combo feature Star Wars Episodes IV-VI. The STAR WARS saga concludes with Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope, Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back, and Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi as Luke Skywalker and Princess Leia, aided by an unforgettable assortment of courageous characters, lead the Rebellion to bring balance back to the Force Star Wars Episode IV: A New HopeNineteen years after the formation of the Empire, Luke Skywalker is thrust into the struggle of the Rebel Alliance when he meets Obi-Wan Kenobi, who has lived for years in seclusion on the desert planet of Tatooine. Obi-Wan begins Luke's Jedi training as Luke joins him on a daring mission to rescue the beautiful Rebel leader Princess Leia from the clutches of the evil Empire. Star Wars Episode V: The Empire Strikes BackIn this installment, Luke Skywalker and his friends have set up a new base on the ice planet of Hoth, but it is not long before their secret location is discovered by the evil Empire. After narrowly escaping, Luke splits off from his friends to seek out a Jedi Master called Yoda. Meanwhile, Han Solo, Chewbacca, Princess Leia, and C-3PO seek sanctuary at a city in the Clouds run by Lando Calrissian, an old friend of Han’s. But little do they realize that Darth Vader already awaits them. Star Wars Episode VI: Return of the Jedi(4 years after Episode IV) In the epic conclusion of the saga, the Empire prepares to crush the Rebellion with a more powerful Death Star while the Rebel fleet mounts a massive attack on the space station. Luke Skywalker confronts Darth Vader in a final climactic duel before the evil Emperor."]
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG (Parental Guidance Suggested)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.6 x 5.4 x 6.8 inches; 7.2 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'FOX2287624BR', 'Media Format': 'AC-3, Dolby, DTS Surround Sound, Dubbed, DVD+Blu-ray, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Run time': '6 hours and 27 minutes', 'Release date': 'October 8, 2013', 'Actors': 'Mark Hamill, Carrie Fisher, Harrison Ford', 'Dubbed': 'Portuguese, French, Spanish', 'Subtitles': 'English, Spanish, Portuguese, French', 'Producers': 'George Lucas', 'Language': 'Unknown (Stereo)', 'Studio': '20th Century Fox Home Entertainment', 'Number of discs': '6'}
Review Text: We bought this and spent the entire time adjusting the volume since the DVd went from loud to low and back again.  Then the second show froze at the middle.  Terrible experience.
Review Title: Terrible experience.
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Celtic Thunder - Christmas
Celtic Thunder  (Actor, Director)    Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Holidays & Seasonal, Christmas
['The heart-warming new Celtic Thunder Show features holiday standards such as "It\'s Beginning To Look A Lot Like Christmas," "Let It Snow," "Winter Wonderland" and "Silent Night" as well as a few specially-written originals, "Going Home For Christmas", "Christmas Morning Donegal" and "Our First Christmas Together". Filmed in Poughkeepsie, NY in front of a live audience, Damian McGinty, Keith Harkin, Paul Byrom, Ryan Kelly and George Donaldson of Celtic Thunder bring together their affinity for a great popular song with outstanding live performances, pay homage to cherished holiday favorites. The show is a holiday celebration for all the family performed as ever with Celtic Thunder magic.', "Track Listings: 1. Christmas Overture 2. It's Beginning To Look A Lot Like Christmas 3. Winter Wonderland 4. Christmas Morning, Donegal 5. Amazing Grace 6. Let It Snow, Let It Snow, Let It Snow 7. Last Christmas 8. When You Wish Upon A Star 9. Silent Night 10. Going Home For Christmas 11. Our First Christmas Together 12. Christmas 1915 13. Baby, It's Cold Outside 14. Ave Maria 15. Hallelujah 16. All I Want For Christmas Is You 17. I Wish It Could Be Christmas Everyday 18. The Most Wonderful Time Of The Year/We Wish You A Merry Christmas 19. Solo Performances - Damian McGinty 20. Solo Performances - Keith Harkin 21. Solo Performances - Ryan Kelly 22. Solo Performances - Paul Byrom 23. Solo Performances - George Donaldson 24. Solo Performances - Neil Byrne 25. All I Want For Christmas Is You - A Very Special Slideshow"]

I enjoyed Celtic Thunder so much of the PBS special so I ordered these and I truly enjoy listening to this great group.
Great music
Celtic Thunder: Heritage
Celtic Thunder  (Actor, Director)    Rated:    Unrated    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Music Videos & Concerts
["Following the success of their last 4 shows the new Celtic Thunder show Heritage accentuates the musical culture of Ireland. The DVD features 12 new recordings including: An Irish Blessing, A Place In The Choir and Whiskey In The Jar. In 2011 March PBS pledge will feature Celtic Thunder's Heritage airing the program over 1,000 times. In the fall of 2011 Celtic Thunder Heritage will be on tour. Over the past 3 years Celtic Thunder has been one of the most successful PBS music programs."]

The Little Mermaid (Two-Disc Diamond Edition: Blu-ray / DVD + Digital Copy)
Jodi Benson  (Actor),     Christopher Daniel Barnes  (Actor),     Ron Clements  (Director, Writer),     John Musker  (Director, Writer)    &                   1                  more   Rated:    G    Format: Blu-ray
Movies & TV, Featured Categories, Blu-ray, Kids & Family
['THE LITTLE MERMAID, one of the most celebrated animated films of all time, is now spectacularly transformed for the first time on Blu-ray, with a state-of-the-art digitally restored picture and brilliant high-definition sound! Venture under the sea where Ariel, a free-spirited mermaid princess, longs to be part of the human world. After bravely striking a bargain with Ursula, a sneaky sea witch, Ariel embarks on the adventure of a lifetime. With Flounder and Sebastian at her side, Ariel will need all of her courage and determination to make things right in both her worlds.']

Classical Stretch Complete Season 8 by ESSENTRICS: Age Defying Series
Miranda Esmonde-White  (Actor)    Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Exercise & Fitness
['Getting older is natural and inevitable. What is not inevitable is our body falling apart from preventable age related conditions such as: poor posture, weight gain, loss of energy, chronic aches and pains, hip and knee replacements, osteoarthritis and osteoporosis. These common age related conditions can be prevented, reversed or slowed down with correct exercise and diet.']

Walk On: 3-DVD Set: 6, 30 Minute Walking Workouts
Jessica Smith  (Actor)    Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Exercise & Fitness
['Get our classic "Walk On: 3 DVD Super Set" 2014 collection! Whatever the weather is in your neck of the woods you can count on sunshine and blue skies in our videos. These workouts were all filmed on location in sunny Florida with a beautiful view of the bay so you can feel like you are striding right outside with us. This 3-DVD Set Includes 6, 30-Minute Walks, or 3 hours of outdoor walking fun:', 'DVD #1: Walk On: Strength and Balance', 'STRIDE & STRENGTH [30 Minutes]: Burn fat and build metabolism boosting lean muscle mass with this two-in-one session! Burn more calories in less time with this maximum results routine that couples HIIT (high intensity interval) cardio training with circuits of strength exercises to make every second of your workout count. FUSION WALK [30 Minutes]: Balance your body with this flowing, feel-good endurance walk is done barefoot (shoes may be worn if preferred) in order to fully engage and strengthen the muscles of the feet and ankles.', 'DVD #2: Walk On: Dance Walk', 'LATIN DANCE WALK [30 Minutes]: Salsa, shimmy and shake off the pounds with this spicy walking workout that uses simple steps to keep your heart rate elevated (and your mind at ease). DANCE WALK [30 Minutes]: Twist, shout and disco dance away the calories with this upbeat walk that mixes together different styles from various decades for a walk that feels more like a party than a work out!', 'DVD #3: Walk On: Tone Your Trouble Zones', 'BUNS AND THIGHS WALK [30 Minutes]: Blast off fat to slim your hips, buns and thighs with this multi-tasking walk that incorporates lower body toning for better, more targeted results. FLAT ABS WALK [30 Minutes]: Walk off weight and shrink your waist by burning calories and developing strong, pulled-in flat abs at the same time with this tummy-targeting walk.']

SWEATIN TO THE OLDIES 5
RICHARD SIMMONS  (Actor)    Rated:    Unrated    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Exercise & Fitness
["With over 2.3 million units of SWEATIN' TO THE OLDIES sold since 2008, Richard Simmons has reclaimed his crown as the King of Fitness. Time Life is proud to present Richard's all new aerobic workout: SWEATIN' TO THE OLDIES 5! Recently filmed in California, Richard uses get-up-and-move music from the 1960s as the backdrop to his signature formula: energizing songs, easy dance moves, real people and lots of fun! Based on the winning formula in his multi-platinum SWEATIN' series, SWEATIN' 5 features the same quality workouts fans expect, complete with Richard's unique encouragement and sassy style."]

Star Wars Trilogy Episodes I-III (Blu-ray + DVD)
Hayden Christiansen  (Actor),     Ewan McGregor  (Actor),     George Lucas  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Format: Blu-ray
Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies
["Star Wars: The Prequel Trilogy on Blu-ray+DVD Combo feature Star Wars Episodes I-III. The greatest space saga ever told begins with Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace, Star Wars: Episode II - Attack of the Clones, and Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith and follows young Anakin Skywalker's descent to the dark side as he transforms from child slave to Jedi apprentice to the evil Darth Vader! Star Wars Episode I: The Phantom Menace(32 Years Before Episode IV) Stranded on the desert planet Tatooine after rescuing young Queen Amidala from the impending invasion of Naboo, Jedi apprentice Obi-Wan Kenobi and his Jedi Master discover nine-year-old Anakin Skywalker, a young slave unusually strong in the Force. Anakin wins a thrilling Podrace and with it his freedom as he leaves his home to be trained as a Jedi. The heroes return to Naboo where Anakin and the Queen face massive invasion forces while the two Jedi contend with a deadly foe named Darth Maul. Only then do they realize the invasion is merely the first step in a sinister scheme by the re-emergent forces of darkness known as the Sith. Star Wars Episode II: Attack of the Clones(22 Years Before Episode IV) Ten years after the events of the Battle of Naboo, not only has the galaxy undergone significant change, but so have Obi-Wan Kenobi, Padmé Amidala, and Anakin Skywalker as they are thrown together again for the first time since the Trade Federation invasion of Naboo. Anakin has grown into the accomplished Jedi apprentice of Obi-Wan, who himself has transitioned from student to teacher. The two Jedi are assigned to protect Padmé whose life is threatened by a faction of political separatists. As relationships form and powerful forces collide, these heroes face choices that will impact not only their own fates, but the destiny of the Republic. Star Wars Episode III: Revenge of the Sith(19 Years before Episode IV) Three years after the onset of the Clone Wars, the noble Jedi Knights have been leading a massive clone army into a galaxy-wide battle against the Separatists. When the sinister Sith unveil a thousand-year-old plot to rule the galaxy, the Republic crumbles and from its ashes rises the evil Galactic Empire. Jedi hero Anakin Skywalker is seduced by the dark side of the Force to become the Emperor's new apprentice - Darth Vader. The Jedi are decimated, as Obi-Wan Kenobi and Jedi Master Yoda are forced into hiding. The only hope for the galaxy are Anakin's own offspring - the twin children born in secrecy who will grow up to become Luke Skywalker and Princess Leia Organa."]
{'Genre': 'Science Fiction & Fantasy', 'Format': 'Blu-ray, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Hayden Christiansen, Natalie Portman, George Lucas, Ewan McGregor', 'Language': 'English', 'Runtime': '6 hours and 59 minutes', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '0.6 x 5.4 x 6.8 inches; 5.6 Ounces', 'Item model number': '99214', 'Director': 'George Lucas', 'Media Format': 'Blu-ray, Widescreen', 'Run time': '6 hours and 59 minutes', 'Release date': 'October 8, 2013', 'Actors': 'Hayden Christiansen, Ewan McGregor, Natalie Portman', 'Dubbed': 'Portuguese, French, Spanish', 'Subtitles': 'English, Spanish, Portuguese, French', 'Studio': '20th Century Fox Home Entertainment', 'Number of discs': '6'}

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Music Preference:** The user enjoys Celtic music, especially performances reflecting Irish culture, with a strong appreciation for seasonal themes, particularly during the holiday season.

- **Content Format:** They prefer DVDs and live performances that provide rich visual and auditory experiences. Their recent experience with a Blu-ray product reveals a consistent priority for high-quality sound and visuals, coupled with frustration when these standards are not met.

- **Holiday Enthusiasm:** A notable fondness for holiday-themed content, particularly Christmas music, indicates that seasonal celebrations heavily influence their entertainment choices.

- **Community Engagement:** The user values ensemble performances, highlighting a preference for collaborative musical experiences that foster a sense of community and shared enjoyment.

- **Quality Focus:** Their emphasis on sound and visual integrity remains crucial, as exemplified by dissatisfaction with recent lower-quality media experiences.

- **Emotional Connection:** Their heartfelt engagement with content suggests that music and storytelling significantly enhance their emotional experiences during festivities.

- **Evolving Interests:** There is a recent shift toward broader content interests, including popular action-adventure films. However, they maintain a discerning taste and a focus on quality across all formats.

Overall, the user exhibits a clear passion for high-quality Celtic music and ensemble performances while navigating and expanding their interests into mainstream media, reinforcing their balanced blend of traditional and contemporary entertainment preferences.
